conclusion: Analyze flow patterns and positions of outlets relative to baffles
Outlet A: Red arrow pointing to the left
Outlet B: Red arrow pointing to the right
Outlet C: Red arrow pointing up
Outlet D: Red arrow pointing down
Baffle E: Red arrow pointing to the left
Baffle F: Red arrow pointing to the right
Outlet A flows into container E
Outlet B flows into container F
Outlet C flows into container F
Outlet D flows into container E
Liquid will flow into container E
